When I run my Bootstrap project locally, the bottom border of the glyphicons in the documentation disappears. Is this normal?

![Screenshot from 2013-12-16 22:28:08](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c92d36e5a68c1affc1d73171c965e80662e88f82d78973b95005df10e6797ec1/68747470733a2f2f662e636c6f75642e6769746875622e636f6d2f6173736574732f353630323931382f313735393130372f66623430386664362d363639392d313165332d393565612d3238623036393536623766372e706e67)

---

When I run my Bootstrap project locally, the bottom border of the glyphicons in the documentation is not visible. Is this expected behavior?

![Screenshot from 2013-12-16 22:28:08](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c92d36e5a68c1affc1d73171c965e80662e88f82d78973b95005df10e6797ec1/68747470733a2f2f662e636c6f75642e6769746875622e636f6d2f6173736574732f353630323931382f313735393130372f66623430386664362d363639392d313165332d393565612d3238623036393536623766372e706e67)
